channel.title: Lists on StarAtt
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on StarAtt

item.title: Distros to begin
item.description:
Here are some distros I like and recommand to start with:

Debian/Ubuntu Based

  • KDE neon
  • Mint
  • Zorin OS

Arch Based

  • Manjaro
  • Xero Linux

Why not Ubuntu?

Ubuntu 22.04 directs apt install to Snap by default, which is only Canonical’s will and might lead to broken or unexpected packages.

item.title: FOSS List
item.description:
Everything listed work on Windows, macOS and Linux.

Web Browser

  • Vivaldi
  • Firefox
  • Brave

General

  • HackMD (online collaboration)
  • LibreOffice (office suite)
  • Marktext (Markdown editor)
  • Syncthing (P2P synchronisation between devices)
  • Xplorer (file explorer)
  • ImageGlass (image viewer)
  • VLC Media Player (media player)
  • 7-Zip (file compressor and extractor)

Communication

  • Element
  • Rocket Chat
  • Jitsi Meet
  • Revolt

Scorewriter

  • MuseScore
  • Frescobaldi (Lilypond)

DAW

  • Ardour
  • LMMS
  • Zrythm

Graphic

  • Krita
  • Inkscape
  • GIMP
  • Darktable
  • Blender

Video

  • Shotcut
  • Kdenlive

Misc

  • OBS Studio
  • Rustdesk
  • Audacity
  • KeePass
  • Nextcloud
